attributes.review: Did you ever hear the tragedy of Darth Plagueis The Wise? I thought not. Itâ€™s not a story the Jedi would tell you. Itâ€™s a Sith legend. Darth Plagueis was a Dark Lord of the Sith, so powerful and so wise he could use the Force to influence the midichlorians to create lifeâ€¦ He had such a knowledge of the dark side that he could even keep the ones he cared about from dying. The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural. He became so powerfulâ€¦ the only thing he was afraid of was losing his power, which eventually, of course, he did. Unfortunately, he taught his apprentice everything he knew, then his apprentice killed him in his sleep. Ironic. He could save others from death, but not himself.

attributes.review: I actually checked out the app in its entirety, and itâ€™s so bad. Very biased, and filled with angry biased men that I swear want to marry trump himself. Other than that, I had to enter my phone number, which at the time I believed to be standard. About 10 minutes later I got a text that said â€œHi Iâ€™m boredâ€, I ignored it. Then a minute later I received another that said â€œso do you like me? Or do you like like me?â€ I was so confused. I asked who it was and i got the reply, â€œDJ Trump, you just downloaded my app....so do you like me? Or do you like like me?â€. Iâ€™ve never been put so on the spot like that. How do I say â€œneitherâ€ to that? I was in a predicament, then I figured out just what to say. I replied â€œArrest the cops that killed Breonna Taylorâ€.
